title: New: Seams – Gorilla
content:
Photo: Brian Sweeney

I’ve known the Seams kids for a while now, and they’re just getting better and better.

Despite all of the quintet being younger than myself, they’re one of the tightest live bands around, and have an adorable sense of camaraderie within the group. Having appeared on BBC R1 last night to perform several tracks during Ally McCrae’s show, the Scottish outfit have released a new track Gorilla as a free download. With Katie’s sublime vocal and the jerky Foals-esque guitar lines, Seams have one of the finest sounds around, striving to embodying a sort of energy that’s vaguely reminiscent of Blood Red Shoes. Check out Gorilla below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
